name: Jadrele's wand of firebolts
data: It increases the users intelligence nicely.
It has non-existent armour class for its type (non-existent in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration nicely.
It gives decent bonus to the skill 'zapping'.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
It shoots out firebolt when pointed at someone ('point wand at <target>').
